modmenu.descriptionTranslation.preventbu: A simple but flexible mod that prevents unwanted player actions described in the custom configs
preventbuild.help_line_2: /pb help - display a list of commands
preventbuild.help_line_3: /pb config list - display a list of configs
preventbuild.help_line_4: /pb config switch <name> - enable/disable config by name
preventbuild.config_without_arguments: §3Type /rh help to see a list of commands
preventbuild.restricted_condition: The condition is restricted by the server: "%s"
preventbuild.not_expected_line_format: Expected line of type "%s" but found "%s"
preventbuild.underline_restriction: Configuration names must not contain '_' characters
